definitions.definition: Going up, physically or in quantity, rate, etc.
Planned or destined to advance to an academic grade in the near future, after having completed the previous grade; soon-to-be .

Having its wings raised (either addorsed or sometimes displayed ), standing on the tips of its feet as if about to take flight, typically depicted in profile . Eagles 2 through 5 are rising with their wings in various attitudes (2: elevated and addorsed; 3: elevated and displayed; 4: addorsed and inverted; 5: displayed and inverted).

main_definition: Going up, physically or in quantity, rate, etc.
secondary_definitions: Planned or destined to advance to an academic grade in the near future, after having completed the previous grade; soon-to-be .

( heraldry , of a bird ) Having its wings raised (either addorsed or sometimes displayed ), standing on the tips of its feet as if about to take flight, typically depicted in profile . Eagles 2 through 5 are rising with their wings in various attitudes (2: elevated and addorsed; 3: elevated and displayed; 4: addorsed and inverted; 5: displayed and inverted).
